tasks.test: deno test --allow-all src/config/environment.test.ts src/main.test.ts src/utils/test-helpers.test.ts && deno test --allow-all --parallel --ignore=src/config/environment.test.ts --ignore=src/main.test.ts --ignore=src/utils/test-helpers.test.ts src/
tasks.test:coverage: deno test --allow-all --coverage=coverage src/config/environment.test.ts src/main.test.ts src/utils/test-helpers.test.ts && deno test --allow-all --coverage=coverage --parallel --ignore=src/config/environment.test.ts --ignore=src/main.test.ts --ignore=src/utils/test-helpers.test.ts src/ && deno coverage coverage --lcov --output=coverage.lcov
tasks.test:ci: deno test --allow-all --coverage=coverage --reporter=junit --junit-path=./test-results.xml src/config/environment.test.ts src/main.test.ts src/utils/test-helpers.test.ts && deno test --allow-all --coverage=coverage --reporter=junit --junit-path=./test-results-parallel.xml --parallel --ignore=src/config/environment.test.ts --ignore=src/main.test.ts --ignore=src/utils/test-helpers.test.ts src/
tasks.precommit: deno task fmt && deno task lint && deno task check && deno task test
tasks.ci: deno task fmt:check && deno task lint && deno task check && deno task test:ci
